channel.title: Looking for Project Rainbow Source and Client
channel.description: Hey guys im looking for Project Rainbows source and client. I want to make a server based off of that source it seems to be a really solid custom source. Ive literally searched everywhere and can not seem to find anything about it so now im turning to you guys any help would be amazing thanks everyone.

item.title: Looking for Project Rainbow Source and Client
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Soulcist:

I don’t ever recall them releasing a source or even a bit of it that was close to their modern one. Also, their community is still online and so I 10x doubt there is one out there. Just going to have to make one based off of it on your own time and with a little bit of patience.

I’ve got their source. If I remember it is from 2012? I don’t think it is my place to be giving it out anyway, but trust me it isn’t even that great of a source to be using. You’re best finding another source.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Project Rainbow Source and Client
